cn.title: 关于比特派暂停 CDY 收发的公告

message.data: 根据 CDY 官方消息，CDY 正在进行官方升级。为此比特派已在香港时间11月14日9：30暂停派钱包 CDY 的收发及派银行 CDY 的充提功能。待 CDY 升级稳定后，我们会在第一时间恢复，具体时间将以公告另行通知。暂停期间为此带来的不便，敬请谅解！

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: Announcement on the Suspension of CDY Sends and Receives Service

message.data: According to CDY official announcement, CDY is undergoing an official upgrade. Hence, Bitpie has suspended the sends and receives service of ZEC in the Pie Wallet and CDY withdrawal and deposit service in Pie Bank at 9:30 a.m. on November 14th (Hong Kong time). When the CDY upgrade is completed and runs stable, we will resume the service immediately, the specific time will be informed as an announcement.
We are sorry for the inconvenience caused during the suspension period.

Find us on
Telegram：t.me/BitpieInternational
Twitter：twitter.com/BitpieWallet
Medium: https://medium.com/@Bitpie
